TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Liability
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.description: Amount of tax liability from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Book Value
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsNoncurr.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Assets, Noncurrent
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsNoncurr.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Trading Securities, Short-term
ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from sales and purchases of trading securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.label: Sale and Leaseback Transaction, Gain (Loss), Net
SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesAmortizedC.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestments.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Investments
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestments.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Incurred Cost
RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the specified type of restructuring cost.

AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Secured Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes tax exempt secured debt.

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.
